column4: Hi , guys newbi to ubuntu , just finished installing ubuntu 9.10 on hp pavillion dv6602au , i am not able to connect to wireless network ..which drivers should i install...please help..
any documentation for beginers would really help..
I dont know the name , WiFi 802.11a/b/g its inbuild..i checked it no specific name is given..
sudo lshw -C network    will tell you
